report.name: 测试
report.description: 税收收入列表，按月统计各种税种收入及财政贡献。

paraDetail.sql: SELECT A.BM,MC NAME,PID,ISLEAF FROM BM_CONT A WHERE A.TABLE_BM='BM_CZFP'

report.title: $czfpbm$测试表一{year}

rptData.sql: select cf.swdjzh,cf.ename,cf.ee as cFhalfYear,cs.ee as cShalfYear,lf.ee as lFhalfYear,ls.ee as lShalfYear from (select a.swdjzh,b.mc as ename,sum(se) as ee from RTK a,dj_cz b where a.czfpbm='08' and rkrq>=20130101 and rkrq<=20130131 and a.swdjzh=b.swdjzh group by a.swdjzh,b.mc)cf,(select c.swdjzh,d.mc as ename,sum(se) as ee from RTK c,dj_cz d where c.czfpbm='08' and rkrq>=20130201 and rkrq<=20130231 and c.swdjzh=d.swdjzh group by c.swdjzh,d.mc)cs, (select e.swdjzh,f.mc as ename,sum(se) as ee from RTK e,dj_cz f where e.czfpbm='08' and rkrq>=20120101 and rkrq<=20120131 and e.swdjzh=f.swdjzh group by e.swdjzh,f.mc)lf, (select r.swdjzh,t.mc as ename,sum(se) as ee from RTK r,dj_cz t where r.czfpbm='08' and rkrq>=20120201 and rkrq<=20120231 and r.swdjzh=t.swdjzh group by r.swdjzh,t.mc)ls where cf.swdjzh=cs.swdjzh and cf.swdjzh=lf.swdjzh and cf.swdjzh=ls.swdjzh
